name: Garifuna Music
description: Music of the Garifuna, an Afro-Indigenous people from Central America and Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.

children.name: Punta
children.description: Garifuna Music with influences from other Caribbean genres such as Reggae, Soca, and Zouk, as well as Hispanic American Music.
